snippet: The report, released by the United Nations, said years of intensive efforts by Afghan and international rights advocates have done little to increase prosecutions.
abstract: United Nations report shows that progress in obtaining justice for abused women in Afghanistan appears to have stalled despite years of intensive effort by Afghan and international rights advocates.
lead_paragraph: The report, released by the United Nations, said years of intensive efforts by Afghan and international rights advocates have done little to increase prosecutions.

headline.main: Afghan Effort to Get Justice for Women Seems to Stall
headline.print_headline: Afghan Effort To Get Justice For Women Seems to Stall
